entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1400 metres this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
